distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for caribou fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2021-3567: Fixed a segfault when attempting to use shifted characters (bsc#1186617).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in Caribou due to a regression of CVE-2020-25712 fix. An attacker could use this flaw to bypass screen-locking applications that leverage Caribou as an input mechanism. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
